subject: Re: [junit] html reports using junit+ant+wsad
msgSnippet: ... Please search the web. You will likely find the Ant task  in the first five hits. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
porus wrote:

> just adivce me how to generate html reports using junit+ant+wsad 5.1.1
>
> i have developed juint test cases and am able to run junit test runs. i
> am unable to generate html reports. please help

Please search the web. You will likely find the Ant task <junitreport>
in the first five hits.
--
